mapper.select: select r.code as exchange_code, resp_e.code as self_exam_code, resp_e.money as self_money, resp_e.name as self_name, resp_e.end_time as self_end_time, resp_e.start_time as self_start_time, resp_e.date as self_date, resp_e.address as self_address, req_e.start_time as target_start_time, req_e.end_time as target_end_time, req_e.date as target_date, req_e.address as target_address, req_e.code as target_exam_code, req_e.money as target_money, req_e.name as target_name, u.name as teacher_name, u.work_id as teacher_work_id, u.telephone as teacher_telephone from exchange r inner join user u on r.response_work_id = u.work_id inner join exam resp_e on resp_e.code = r.response_exam_code inner join exam req_e on req_e.code = r.request_exam_code where u.work_id = #{workId} and r.state = 0

select r.response_invigilate_code as exam_invigilate_code, r.code as exam_exchange_code, e.code as exam_exam_code, e.start_time as exam_start_time, e.end_time as exam_end_time, e.date as exam_date, e.name as exam_name, e.address as exam_address, e.money as exam_money, u.work_id as work_id, u.name as name, u.telephone as telephone from exchange r inner join user u on r.response_work_id = u.work_id inner join invigilate i on r.request_invigilate_code = i.code inner join exam e on i.exam_code = e.code where r.request_invigilate_code = #{invigilateCode} and r.state = 0
